description: A marketing expert with a keen sense of trends, skilled at creating viral topics.
An investigative journalist who seeks the truth and is accustomed to public questioning.
An engineer obsessed with cutting-edge technology, who enjoys public evangelism.
An experienced value investor who only shares deep insights within his own circle.
A middle-aged person working in a regulatory agency, cautious with words, and only speaks in work-related circles.
A young person new to the market who likes to share bandwagon information on social media.
An art student skilled at expressing emotional thoughts through images and short videos.
A social media intern who follows internet memes and is good at derivative creations.
A senior programmer who has seen it all and only complains in developer communities.
A university philosophy professor accustomed to deep speculation in academic forums.
